item.title: Understanding Word Vectors and Implementing Skip-gram with Negative Sampling
item.description: An introduction to understand word vectors (otherwise known as word embeddings) and to implement SGNS from scratch using Numpy.

item.title: Best Data Science Resources for Absolute Beginners
item.description: I share my experience in selecting the best resources to learn Data Science for an absolute beginner.
